title: Rosa Brooks, "Tangled Up in Blue: Policing the American City"
description:
Georgetown Law professor Rosa Brooks details her experiences in policing after becoming an armed reserve police officer in Washington, DC. She’s interviewed by Houston Police Chief and Major Cities Chiefs Association President Art Acevedo.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
